history.proof: intros x. unfold continuity_pt. intros eps. simpl. exists eps. split. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros y Hy. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x. unfold continuity_pt. intros eps. unfold locally'. simpl. exists eps. split. - apply cond_pos. - intros y Hy. unfold Rabs. simpl. unfold minus. rewrite Rminus_0_r. apply Hy.
